api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-2023-it-certifications.p.rapidapi.com/AMH0f6/certifications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-2023-it-certifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://top-2023-it-certifications.p.rapidapi.com/AMH0f6/certifications"
